perception.summarizer_summary: Don Tapscott and Anthony Williams have advocated for open source strategies concerning clean technologies, specifically proposing a green technology commons in their 2010 book, MacroWikinomics. They emphasized the urgency of addressing climate change and promoted collaborative solutions.
